5078541.projn: ID-2nd Trade Policy Adjustment Ln -- P003962
5078541.admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

repnme.cdata!:
Indonesia - Second Trade Policy Adjustment
            Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Trade Policy Adjustment Loan
            Project aims to to support the substantial reforms,
            especially in the area of trade policy, undertaken by the
            Government during 1987, and to assist in bringing about an
            early recovery in economic activity consistent with external
            and domestic financial stability. The project also plans to
            maintain the policy dialogue on further reforms, including
            the preparation of a medium term plan for tariff
            rationalization. The loan intends to finance general imports
            of goods to meet part of the country's near term
            foreign exchange requirements, while supporting the
            Government's commitment to promote the efficiency and
            long term viability of the economy.

docna.cdata!:
Indonesia - Second Trade Policy Adjustment
            Loan Project

display_title.display_title:
Indonesia - Second Trade Policy
            Adjustment Loan Project
